ch.grengine.load

Class SourceClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • ch.grengine.load.SourceClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BytecodeClassLoader, LayeredClassLoader

    public abstract class SourceClassLoader
extends ClassLoader
implements Cloneable
    Abstract class loader that can load the main and other classes of a source.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alain Stalder, Made in Switzerland.

    • Constructor Summary

      constructor from parent class loader.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract SourceClassLoader clone()
      creates a clone with identical behavior, typically sharing the same bytecode.
      abstract BytecodeClassLoader findBytecodeClassLoaderBySource(Source source)
      tries to find the bytecode class loader that can load classes that were created by compiling the given source.
      abstract LoadMode getLoadMode()
      gets the load mode.
      abstract Class<?> loadClass(Source source, String name)
      loads a class with the given name and from the given source.
      abstract Class<?> loadMainClass(Source source)
      loads the main class of the given source.
      abstract void releaseClasses(ClassReleaser releaser)
      release metadata for all classed ever loaded by this class loader.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMainClass

        public abstract Class<?> loadMainClass(Source source)
        loads the main class of the given source.

        First searches for the source, then loads the main class that resulted from compiling the source.

        Parameters:
        source - source
        Returns:
        main class
        Throws:
        CompileException - if compilation was necessary to load the class and failed
        LoadException - if loading failed, including if the class was not found
        Since:
        1.0

      • loadClass

        public abstract Class<?> loadClass(Source source,
                                   String name)
        loads a class with the given name and from the given source.

        First searches for the source, only then for the class with given name as part of the classes that resulted from compiling the source.

        Parameters:
        source - source
        name - class name
        Returns:
        class
        Throws:
        CompileException - if compilation was necessary to load the class and failed
        LoadException - if loading failed, including if the class was not found
        Since:
        1.0

      • findBytecodeClassLoaderBySource

        public abstract BytecodeClassLoader findBytecodeClassLoaderBySource(Source source)
        tries to find the bytecode class loader that can load classes that were created by compiling the given source.
        Parameters:
        source - source
        Returns:
        bytecode class loader if found, null otherwise
        Since:
        1.0

      • getLoadMode

        public abstract LoadMode getLoadMode()
        gets the load mode.
        Returns:
        load mode
        Since:
        1.0

      • clone

        public abstract SourceClassLoader clone()
        creates a clone with identical behavior, typically sharing the same bytecode.
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object
        Returns:
        clone
        Since:
        1.0

      • releaseClasses

        public abstract void releaseClasses(ClassReleaser releaser)
        release metadata for all classed ever loaded by this class loader.

        Allows to remove metadata associated by Groovy (or Java) with a class, which is often necessary to get on-the-fly garbage collection.

        Generally call only when really done using this class loader and all loaded classes; subsequently trying to use this class loader or its classes results generally in undefined behavior.

        Parameters:
        releaser - class releaser
        Since:
        1.1
